conbody.p: Use Files to send tool to selct and upload files to the cloud storage. It is used on the teacher side when creating and modifying assignments and on the student side when files are used as a part of their answer to the assignment.
Elements on the figure above are:

row.entry: List of files to be uploaded.

conbody.p: The list of files contains columns for the file name, file type, size, modification date and time, and an optional comment field.
The Total size field shows total number and size of files to be uploaded to the cloud. The Add files button opens a standard file selection dialog.
conbody.note: An error message will be shown if the number of files for the assignment exceeds 10 (see xref _fixme_). The Total size field will turn red if total size of the assignment files exceeds the remaining could storage quota. Hover the mouse pointer over it for additional details.

fig.title: Excessive number of files error message

image.alt: Excessive number of files error message

conbody.p: Press the Add URL button to add a WWW link as a part of the assignment or your answer to it (see section _fixme_ [xref] for further details). Press the Remove button to remove selected items from the list.
